Bak abim sana şimdi gösterecek ben nasıl iyi osbir çekilir, hade başlayalım abem benim.

Öncelikle abe girecen sen gamebanana annadın? Oraya yazacan Fem Pyro indirecen onu kuracan, dosyalara atacan. Annadın?

Sonra girecen oyuna kendine dizecen güzel Pyro set. Fem Pyro ya yakışacak ama abem okey? Sonra abe senin malafatı uyandıracak şekilde itemler dizecen anladın? Sonra açacan onu uçaracan uzaya. Hade bakim .

consigliereri questo gioco per i fan dei rpg, ma ha il suo effetto negativo cioè che ci sono solo 9 personaggi e non mi va bene e soprattutto guadagni i oggetti casualmente.

io avrei messo delle quest che ti potevano dare xp per i personaggi ( non ci sono i livelli dei personaggi ) e che ti potrebbero dare oggetti armi o oro per aprire le casse ( bisogna spendere per aprire le casse $$$ ) così potrei aprire le casse senza spendere soldi.

ma per il resto è ottimo...

Open Steam, pick your class
Saddle up to kick some ass!
Yer multiplayer dreams come true
When you play Team Fortress 2!

Well, the heavy spins a mini gun
The scout can't do much else but run
Side with red or side with blu
When you play Team Fortress 2!

Well, the Snipers and the Pyros might make you wanna ragequit
Make sure they ain't a spy though, 'cause spies are (bleep)ing bull(bleep)

The Engineer can build cool stuff
And Demoman can blow it up
A hell of a good time waits for you
Right inside Team Fortress 2!

If the soldier gets a decent shot, he'll knock you out yo' pants
And the heavy and the medic share a legendary bromance...

Work together as a team
Download douchey hats on Steam
The doors are openin' that's yer cue...
Time to play Team Fortress 2!

(©Brent Black)

Что такое Team Fortress 2 в 2017 году:
Баланс в Team Fortress 2 – это когда в твоей команде 90% игроков f2p новички, а у противника 90% опытных игроков.
Баланс в Team Fortress 2 – это когда под конец матча у тебя очков больше чем у всей твоей команды вместе взятой.
Баланс в Team Fortress 2 – это когда после первого раунда вы уже играете 7 vs 12.
Баланс в Team Fortress 2 – это когда за место ливнувшего нуба к противнику присоединяется задрот 150 лвл, и вся ваша команда внезапно начинает проигрывать.
Баланс в Team Fortress 2 – это когда вам наоборот вместо ливнувшего задрота закидывает f2p нуба 1лвл, и вся команда также начинает проигрывать.
---
Игроки в Team Fortress 2 – это когда твоя команда на 70% состоит из бесполезных снайперов и шпионов.
Игроки в Team Fortress 2 – это когда задроты старой закалки играют жёстче читеров, и без шансов нагибают весь сервер.
---
Рандом в Team Fortress 2 – это когда за всю игру тебе выпадает 1 крит, и выпадет он во время подготовки.
Рандом в Team Fortress 2 – это когда все убивают тебя с одного удара в мили сражении.
---
Team Fortress 2 – это когда различных шапок в игре больше, чем разнообразного оружия.
---
И многое-многое другое… Люблю эту игру!

The best, and the only war themed, class based hat simulator. This game means so much to so many people, even when it had its worst through the years, the community continues to keep this game alive. Through thick and thin, this game continues to strive forward.

Team Fortress 2 is a timeless masterpiece, and I'm hoping it would still live on.

Team Fortress 2. Never before have I seen a game perfectly capture the zany, wacky, violent, and slightly sadistic part of my mind. How many other games can you think of where you can play as a man who can beat someone to death WITH A FISH whilst wearing a unicorn hat? Yeah, you can't. Because that game doesn't exist. Except it does, because Team Fortress 2 exists.

Though I give it a 8/10 just because newbie players can get pretty bored when they get wrecked by every single thing in the game.

O que é BF 1 perto dessa obra de arte.

<INTRO>
Ok where do i start firstly I have litte to 900 hours of Tf2 so i think i know what im saying i've dabbled in comp. done low to mid tier trading and i woud rate myself a top 3 leaderboard of a server i know how to rocket jump sticky jump learning to wrange jump So unlike half of the reivews here i did'nt play the game for 5 hours.
 <BASICS>
Ok for a free to play game its good it has the best free to play modell all stock weapons are the best comp. yes the other weapon unlocks are just side-grades so don't yell at this reivew saying the weapons give buffs and debuffs a weapons can be unlocked for free k. 

<HOW MUCH CONTENT>
Now how long will the game last you well for someone who has 900 hours i scratched the surface with this game it has the highest skill curver ever in a game community servers are good like jailbreak is great for troling trade servers are useless now and just deathmatch adn regualr games are just that regular games. 
There are over around 50 maps in the game give or take and all can be mastered the tf2 team has a good casual system to pick whatver maps you want and whatever ping settings great. Tf2 is know for customisation all your weapons hats and ways you play are so diffrent. This game does have 1 big problem trading which is a 3rd of the community is dead well except for unusuals high priced hats that have sparkles effects I know great. 
   

<DIFFRENT FACTIONS OF TF2>

Getting in is very hard personally i stayed around mid to low tier trading. Trading from nothing can be done if skilled enough but takes a very very very long time going through all the crap. Still if you just throw 20 dollars you can get a unusual and then trade up. In the end the 3 factions of tf2 casual,comp, and trading both work in synergy most of the time. 

<SAPPY STUFF AND MY SCORE>
In the end tf2 is one of the greatest gamesI played Ive made most of my steam friends from it i remeber so many good memories form this in the end i give tf2 a 9/10.
ive been playing this game for four years, and this is really the best game i have had the pleasure of playing.
